      • getAdminProfileAlgorithm

        public static java.lang.String getAdminProfileAlgorithm(IConfigStore config)
                                                 throws EBaseException,
                                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        reads from the admin cert profile caAdminCert.profile and determines the algorithm as follows: 1. First gets list of allowed algorithms from profile (constraint.params.signingAlgsAllowed) If entry does not exist, uses entry "ca.profiles.defaultSigningAlgsAllowed" from CS.cfg If that entry does not exist, uses basic default 2. Gets default.params.signingAlg from profile. If entry does not exist or equals "-", selects first algorithm in allowed algorithm list that matches CA signing key type Otherwise returns entry if it matches signing CA key type.
        Throws:
        EBaseException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
